About Me

Hey I'm Benjamin! (he/him)

I am a Senior at the University of Georgia who has been programming for 4+ years. I am currently a Software Engineering Intern at NCR in Atlanta. Ever since I started coding indie games in middle school, I have loved the thrill of being curious and jumping headfirst into a project. I care about the quality and design of the things I build and I am constantly looking for ways to bring software solutions to surprising new problems. I hope you enjoy some of the work I have showcased here and please feel free to connect on Linkedin or shoot me an email.
